# cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role_assignment (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_iam_custom_role_assignment" "custom_role_ec" {
	custom_role_id = "7546cf8d-3df3-4452-8111-51aff5392609"
	project_id     = "fab8c1b9-333f-4c7d-98b8-aebd6882cbd1"
	group_id       = "aa2b0794-3a8e-4c61-a11e-a9dd23af5c04"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `custom_role_id` (String) The ID of the custom role.
- `group_id` (String) The id of the group.
- `project_id` (String) The ID of the project.
